#summary Common development practices of the project

= Issue tags =
Issues (either a defect or task) are marked with following tags, which distinguishes functional domains of  the application:

  * *structure* - changes to project structure - arranging source code, build process changes etc.
  * *crud* - base Create Read Update Delete functionality. Everything that manipulates data (users, topics, attributes etc.) falls into this category
  * *security* - Roles, Privileges, visibility/accessibility of certain modules
  * *publishing* - posting to social networks, forums
